Title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
Plot: The Guardians struggle to keep together as a team while dealing with their personal family issues.
Cast: Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana, Dave Bautista

Title: Avengers: Endgame
Plot: After the devastating events of Infinity War, the remaining Avengers must find a way to reverse Thanos' actions.
Cast: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Plot: A young hobbit named Frodo Baggins sets out on an epic quest to destroy the One Ring.
Cast: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom

Title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
Plot: Miles Morales returns for the next chapter of the Spider-Verse saga, facing new challenges and meeting new allies.
Cast: Shameik Moore, Hailee Steinfeld, Oscar Isaac

Title: The Shawshank Redemption
Plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
Cast: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton

Title: Transformers: Rise of the Beasts
Plot: During the 1990s, a battle for the fate of Earth begins between two factions of Transformers.
Cast: Anthony Ramos, Dominique Fishback, Luna Lauren Velez

Title: Django Unchained
Plot: With the help of a bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.
Cast: Jamie Foxx, Christoph Waltz, Leonardo DiCaprio

Title: Hotel Transylvania
Plot: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort for monsters, falls in love with a human who stumbles upon the resort.
Cast: Adam Sandler, Andy Samberg, Selena Gomez

Title: Deadpool 2
Plot: Deadpool forms a team of mutants to protect a young boy from a powerful mutant.
Cast: Ryan Reynolds, Josh Brolin, Morena Baccarin

Title: The Dark Knight
Plot: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.
Cast: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart

Title: Inception
Plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.
Cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page

Title: The Pursuit of Happyness
Plot: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he battles with homelessness.
Cast: Will Smith, Jaden Smith, Thandie Newton

Title: Whiplash
Plot: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his aggressive instructor pushes him to the limits of his ability.
Cast: Miles Teller, J.K. Simmons, Melissa Benoist

Title: The King's Speech
Plot: The story of King George VI, his impromptu ascension to the throne and the speech therapist who helped him overcome his speech impediment.
Cast: Colin Firth, Geoffrey Rush, Helena Bonham Carter

Title: The Help
Plot: An aspiring author during the civil rights movement of the 1960s decides to write a book detailing the African American maids' points of view on the white families for which they work.
Cast: Viola Davis, Octavia Spencer, Emma Stone

Title: Inside Out 2
Plot: A sequel that features Riley entering puberty and experiencing brand new, more complex emotions as a result. As Riley tries to adapt to her teenage years, her old emotions try to adapt to the possibility of being replaced.
Cast: Amy Poehler, Maya Hawke, Kensington Tallman

Title: The Three Musketeers - Part II: Milady
Plot: D'Artagnan is forced to join forces with Milady to save Constance, who was kidnapped before his eyes. But as war is declared and Athos, Porthos and Aramis have already joined the front, a secret from the past shatters old alliances.
Cast: Fran√ßois Civil, Vincent Cassel, Romain Duris

Title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
Plot: The origin story of renegade warrior Furiosa before her encounter and teamup with Mad Max.
Cast: Anya Taylor-Joy, Chris Hemsworth, Tom Burke

Title: Bad Boys: Ride or Die
Plot: This Summer, the world's favorite Bad Boys are back with their iconic mix of edge-of-your seat action and outrageous comedy but this time with a twist: Miami's finest are now on the run.
Cast: Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Vanessa Hudgens
